scripts.build:js: browserify index.js -t browserify-css -t [ babelify --optional es7.objectRestSpread ] | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > build.js
scripts.watch:js: watchify index.js -t browserify-css -t [ babelify --optional es7.objectRestSpread ] -g livereactload --debug --verbose -o build.js
scripts.reload:js: npm run watch:js & livereactload monitor build.js & wait
scripts.dev: npm run reload:js & npm run reload:html
